value.title: StarCraft 2: EPIC GAME - The NEW World Champion vs Dark!
value.excerpt: Top level game of StarCraft 2 between Oliveira (Terran) and Dark (Zerg). While the new SC2 World Champion Oliveira is a well-known game in the StarCraft 2 community, he recently really stepped it up. In this game he takes on Dark in a straight-up battle on Gresvan.
